mapper.sql: id, device_company_id, device_id, assign_date, release_date, flag_deleted, assign_type, assigned_section_id, assigned_employee_id, create_time, create_person, update_time, update_person
mapper.insert:
insert into dmi_device_assign
id,
device_company_id,
device_id,
assign_date,
release_date,
flag_deleted,
assign_type,
assigned_section_id,
assigned_employee_id,
create_time,
create_person,
update_time,
update_person,
memo,

mapper.update:
update dmi_device_assign
device_company_id = #{deviceCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assign_date = #{assignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
release_date = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
assign_type = #{assignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assigned_section_id = #{assignedSectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assigned_employee_id = #{assignedEmployeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dmi_device_assign
device_company_id = #{deviceCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assign_date = #{assignDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
release_date = #{releaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
assign_type = #{assignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assigned_section_id = #{assignedSectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assigned_employee_id = #{assignedEmployeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND device_company_id = #{deviceCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,
from dmi_device_assign where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND flag_deleted = 0

select device.device_name AS deviceName, device.device_sn AS deviceSn, relation.asset_sn AS assetSn, device.brand AS brand, (SELECT series_name FROM bif_device_series WHERE id = (SELECT series_id FROM bif_device_model WHERE id = device.model_id)) AS series, device.model AS model, device.catalog_id AS catalogId, relation.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, device.warranty_expire_date AS warrantyExpireDate, device.memo AS memo from dmi_device_assign deviceAssign INNER JOIN bif_device device ON device.id = deviceAssign.device_id INNER JOIN dmi_device_company_relation relation ON relation.device_id = deviceAssign.device_id where deviceAssign.assigned_section_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND deviceAssign.assign_type = 'STORE' AND deviceAssign.flag_deleted = 0

SELECT deviceAssign.id AssignId, device.device_name AS deviceName, device.brand AS brand, model.model_name AS model, device.device_sn AS deviceSn, deviceCompanyRelation.asset_sn AS assetSn, typeCatalog.catalog_name AS catalogName, deviceAssign.id AS deviceStoreRelationId, deviceCompanyRelation.id AS deviceCompanyRelationId, deviceCompanyRelation.memo AS deviceCompanyRelationMemo, deviceAssign.assign_type AS assignType, deviceAssign.update_time AS updateTime, CASE deviceAssign.assign_type WHEN 'PERSON' THEN employee.employee_name WHEN 'STORE' THEN store.store_name WHEN 'ORG' THEN organization.organization_name ELSE '' END AS assignTypeName, device.id AS id FROM bif_device device INNER JOIN bif_device_model model ON model.id = device.model_id
AND model.id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND model.flag_deleted = 0
INNER JOIN bif_device_brand brand ON brand.id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND brand.flag_deleted = 0
INNER JOIN dmi_device_company_relation deviceCompanyRelation ON device.id = deviceCompanyRelation.device_id AND deviceCompanyRelation.flag_deleted = 0 AND deviceCompanyRelation.flag_assign = 1
AND deviceCompanyRelation.asset_sn LIKE '%${assetSn}%'
INNER JOIN (dmi_device_assign deviceAssign LEFT JOIN dmi_store store ON store.id = deviceAssign.assigned_section_id LEFT JOIN dmi_organization organization ON organization.id = deviceAssign.assigned_section_id LEFT JOIN dmi_employee employee ON employee.id = deviceAssign.assigned_employee_id) ON device.id = deviceAssign.device_id AND deviceAssign.assigned_section_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND deviceAssign.flag_deleted = 0 AND assign_type = 'STORE' LEFT JOIN cfg_device_type_catalog typeCatalog ON device.catalog_id = typeCatalog.id WHERE device.flag_deleted = 0
and device.catalog_id in
#{parentId}
and device.device_sn LIKE '%${deviceSn}%'
